column4: bah.. my mouse just died... anyone know what part of gnome is responsible for handling the mouse? can I restart some subprocess to make it work again?
X handles the mouse, not Gnome, i would just unplug it and plug it back in
nah, the 'sd' one is quite common
it is? ah.. I've got it too.. nevermind then.. thanks for the heads up
what does axf do?
man ps
